title: Insights on the comparative affinity of ribonucleic acids with plant-based beta carboline alkaloid, harmine: Spectroscopic, calorimetric and computational evaluation
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Paromita Sarkar, Priyanka Gopi, Prateek Pandya, Samaresh Paria, Maidul Hossain, Manzer H. Siddiqui, Saud Alamri, Kakali Bhadra
